text: hello and welcome to awl and
Certification presentation on how to get
the right skills to succeed in cloud
with AWS my name is Danny Daniel and we
are going to explore how to get started
on this aw learning journey will discuss
industry trends importance of training
their role based and speciality learning
offerings and certifications off by AWS
cloud is growing exponentially and we
are seeing more and more companies
relying on AWS and more and more people
are coming to learn about cloud numerous
countries have included cloud computing
skills as a key pillar to their
digitization and smart nation efforts as
more customers are seeing the benefits
of cloud computing there is increased
demand for cloud skills in the
marketplace this chart shows that indeed
job postings with the word AWS are up to
600 percent since 2012 this increased
demand has led to cloud skills deficit
and organizations are now facing a
challenge of finding skilled IT talents
additionally AWS continues to innovate
more and more every year to meet our
customers need last year we had 722
releases this year we are averaging
three to four releases a day innovation
is happening at an increased rate it is
the new normal when you combine the
cloud skills gap with rapid innovation
it becomes clear why you need to think
about education as part of your overall
cloud strategy at AWS we believe cloud
education applies to your entire
organization it's important to develop a
holistic approach and a culture of
continuous learning to keep up with
innovation so I would like to introduce
to you the offerings from AWS training
and certification team that will help
build cloud skills by understanding what
resources are available we make the
transition to the cloud easier and
ensure you get the most out of your
investments your learning journey starts
with
cloud practitioner essentials and
attaining cloud practitioner
certification you can then further your
learning using our catalog of role based
learning paths the architecting Learning
Path is intended for solution architects
to transition their skills to AWS it
teaches aid abuse cloud best practices
and recommend the design patterns
through case studies and labs it enables
solution architects to build complex
scalable elastic highly available and
secure solutions on AWS then we have a
developing Learning Path which teaches
developers how to use the AWS SDK to
develop secure and scalable cloud
applications AWS offers wide range of
tools and sample codes to code deploy
and manage your application on AWS then
we have added an Operations Learning
Path which teaches the best practices of
operating automating and maintaining
cloud applications and systems and
finally the DevOps Learning Path which
teaches DevOps patterns for developing
and deploying applications on AWS on top
of role based learning we also offer a
solution based learning these courses
are geared towards teaching a process or
strategy to complete a project or a
series of tasks we offer training
solutions for big data these courses are
suitable for solution architects data
scientists and anyone who implements Big
Data cloud solutions the course
introduces you to cloud-based big data
solutions such as Amazon EMR Amazon
redshift Amazon Kinesis and the rest of
the AWS big date of platform our data
warehousing training offerings allows
you to gain in-depth knowledge of how to
collect store and prepare data for the
data warehouse and use business
intelligence tools to perform analysis
your data the course introduces you to
concepts strategies and best practices
for designing a cloud-based data
warehousing solution using Amazon
redshift it also teaches you how to
collect store and prepare data for the
data warehouse by using other AWS
services such as Amazon DynamoDB
Amazon EMR Amazon Kinesis firehose and
Amazon s3 our security training
offerings will enable you to learn how
to stay secure and compliant in the AWS
cloud including aid abuse best practices
and security features of key AWS
services the course highlights security
features of AWS key services examines
use case of running regulated workloads
and uses tools to automate and
continuously monitor your cloud
applications
finally our migrating to AWS teaches
cloud migration strategies and dives
into recommended five-phase plan for
migrating existing workloads to the AWS
cloud the five phase plan includes
portfolio discovery application
migration planning and design migration
execution and post migration validation
and application optimization with a
range of training options available to
you you can choose the one that best
suits your own learning style
we offer free digital training courses
so your team can learn aww spunda
mentals at their own pace browse our
learning catalog at AWS dot training our
most popular option is instructor-led
classroom trainings your employees can
attend a public class near you or we can
come directly to you with private
on-site trainings you can find the
scheduled public classes at
aws.amazon.com slash training we also
offer eight AWS
certifications to validate your
expertise with an industry-recognized
credential this includes cloud
practitioner associate level
certifications professional level
certifications and speciality
certifications plus if your employees
want to learn more we offer other
resources like white papers
certification preparation guides and
training at regional events here is a
sampling of some of the training courses
we offer you can browse our complete
catalogue at AWS training you can search
for training relevant to you and your
organisation's at AWS training you can
browse by role or content type or search
by product using keyword filters our
certifications aligned to the roles we
talked about earlier they validate
technical expertise at the associate and
profession level so that you can
identify top IT talents we suggest
incorporating tech certifications into
your skills development plan to get
hands-on I would highly encourage you to
create an AWS account go to
aws.amazon.com slash free for detailed
information about the free tier you will
find many services are offered free in
the first twelve months to a limit once
you've created an account you will find
on the management console a section
title learn to build this section offers

following through a project you will
immerse yourself in user guides videos

with the tools the projects include
everything from a static website a
wordpress site through to machine
learning
big data and analytics when practicing
with projects don't worry if you break

to break something to learn that better
and have an opportunity to fix it by
going back checking every setting you

here you will find a guidance on a

at Autodesk for a software company we
